item.title: Overgrown bramble branches danger to pavement users, 4th August
item.description:

item.title: Dirt on road and pavement, 4th August
item.description:
The contractors for optic fibre installation have left a terrible mess in the road and on the pavements of the uneven number side of Hengist Way. The worst is outside number 11 and 15
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, Hengist Way, Shortlands, London

item.title: Litter collected on a litter pick, 4th August
item.description:
Please pick up the bag from beside the litter bin. This litter was collected from Hayes Way and part of Wickham Way by a Park Langley litter picker. Warning the bag does contain a broken bottle and some broken flower pots.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Barnfield Wood Road, Park Langley, London

item.title: Abandoned bikes falling apart, 4th August
item.description:
There are 2 bikes and a set of wheels locked to a public bike rack. (google street view shows that these bikes have been here since at least 2023 (more than 2 years). This is a well used path and rack and the bikes are getting in the way or the path and metal parts of them are falling into the road and street

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Staffordshire Street, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Control Parking Zone Sign spray painted over, 4th August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Langdale Close, Walworth, London
